title: Matplotlib Date Tick Customization Using Recurrence Rules
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use recurrence rules in Matplotlib to place date ticks. The iCalender RFC\_ specifies recurrence rules (rrules), that define date sequences. You can use rrules in Matplotlib to place date ticks. This example sets custom date ticks on every 5th Easter.

meta.title: Customizing Date Ticks with Matplotlib Recurrence Rules
meta.description: Learn how to use recurrence rules in Matplotlib to place custom date ticks, including setting ticks on every 5th Easter.
meta.keywords: rrules, python playground, date customization, matplotlib, python, recurrence rules, date ticks
